00023 #ifndef CRC32_H
00024 #define CRC32_H
00025 
00026 #include "system.h"
00027 #include <stddef.h>
00028 
00030 #define CRC32_NEXT(CRC, STR)                                    \
00031    (crc32_table[((CRC) ^ *(STR)++) & 0xff] ^ ((CRC) >> 8))
00032 
00034 extern const unsigned int crc32_table[256];
00035 
00036 extern unsigned int crc32_update (unsigned int crc, const void *buf, size_t len);
00037 extern unsigned int crc32_buffer (const void *buf, size_t len);
00038 extern unsigned int crc32_string (const char *s);
00039 
00040 #endif
